Engine

Interface ImageWindow


  • public interface ImageWindow
    The interface ImageWindow must be implemented by all windows that contain a ImagePanel object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.swing.JScrollBar getHorizontalScrollBar()
      Returns the horizontal scroll bar of the window, associated to the image.
      javax.swing.JScrollBar getVerticalScrollBar()
      Returns the vertical scroll bar of the window, associated to the image.
      void notifyImageInfo(java.lang.String info)
      The ImagePanel object notifies to the window some image information.
      void notifyTotalBytes(int bytes)
      The ImagePanel object notifies to the window the total received bytes.

    • Method Detail

      • getHorizontalScrollBar

        javax.swing.JScrollBar getVerticalScrollBar()
        Returns the vertical scroll bar of the window, associated to the image.

      • notifyImageInfo

        void notifyImageInfo(java.lang.String info)
        The ImagePanel object notifies to the window some image information.

      • notifyTotalBytes

        void notifyTotalBytes(int bytes)
        The ImagePanel object notifies to the window the total received bytes.
